attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo yum install -y yum-utils \
  device-mapper-persistent-data \
  lvm2
  
sudo yum-config-manager \
    --add-repo \
    https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
    
sudo yum update xfsprogs -y
sudo yum install docker-ce -y
sudo systemctl start docker

docker run -d -p 80:80 camilodu/nginx_team32:part1

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application

action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
mkdir -p /var/www/projects/uptick
yum install git -y
yum update nss curl libcurl -y
yum install -y gcc-c++ make
curl -sL https://rpm.nodesource.com/setup_6.x | sudo -E bash -
yum install nodejs -y
cd /var/www/projects/uptick
git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git
chmod -R 755 /var/www/projects/uptick
cd /var/www/projects/uptick
npm build

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
